plot outline: Kudiyarasu is a 2009 Indian Tamil film, directed by Sabir Hussain and produced by K.Suresh Kannan and E.S.Satya Narayana. The film stars Vignesh, Suguna, Suresh, Neeba, Nizhalgal Ravi, Srikanth and Anu Mohan in lead roles. The film had musical score by Karthik Raaja. Watch the full movie Kudiyarasu online, only on Eros Now.
